SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as num , a.notice_idx, a.title, a.content, a.notice_type, a.view_count, a.create_user, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as create_date, ( SELECT count(*) FROM daul_notice_attach b WHERE b.notice_idx = a.notice_idx AND del_chk ='N' ) as attach_count, a.del_chk FROM daul.daul_notice a, (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP WHERE a.del_chk = 'N'
AND a.title like concat('%',#{search},'%')
AND a.content like concat('%',#{search},'%')
AND a.create_user like concat('%',#{search},'%')
AND create_date >= date_format(concat(#{search_s_date}, ' 00:00:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND create_date <= date_format(concat(#{search_e_date}, ' 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
ORDER BY create_date ASC ) sub ORDER BY sub.num DESC;
